English: (zoology) segment (of the body of a worm, centipede etc)

d.f: `某些~`低等動物~`如~`蚯蚓~、`蜈蚣~`等~，`身體~`由~`許~`多大小~`相近~，`且~`能~`伸縮~`的~`環~`狀~`結構~`互相~`連接~`組成~，`這些~`結構~`稱~`為~「`環節~」。

e: `如~：「`這個~`工廠~`的~`運作~，`品質管制~`是~`較~`弱~`的~`環節~。」
d.f: `互相~`關連~`的~`許多~`事物~`中的~`一個~。

English: (zoology) segment (of the body of a worm, centipede etc)
(fig.) a part of an integrated whole: aspect (of a project), element (of a policy), sector (of the economy), stage (of a process), etc
